title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year on year percentage change, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Year on year percentage change has increased over the Year.
Year on year percentage change is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, gradually increasing from 2018 to 2019, and lastly roughly constant from 2019 to 2020.
Max Year on year percentage change about 2.6 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Year on year percentage change about 0.3 was recorded at Year 2017, and 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year on year percentage change, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2019 to 2020.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2018 to 2019.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2017 to 2018.
